extendedInfo.description: Have you ever dreamed about Angry Birds in World War II time? No??? Really??? Don't be shy! We are going to war with grenades, tanks and bombers!Creators of Cars And Guns 3D have come back to present a fast action game with fabulous ragdolls, realistic explosions and physics. Over 50 battles in 10 countries, 3 game modes, multiplayer on one device, global leaderboards, allies and axis fractions and many, many more!If you like the game, support us by rating 5, so we will add new weapons and battles soon. Key features:- 3D graphics- over 50 battles in 10 countries (more will come in updates)- 2 military campaigns (Allies and Axis)- 3 game modes- physics-based gameplay- multiplayer (2 players on one device)- grenades, tanks, bombers and mass destruction!- in-game shop- online leaderboards- lovely ragdolls and explosions- super turbo cute war graphic styleFight and win in Angry World War 2 FREE! Have fun!

reviews.title: Tired of the ads
reviews.comment: Seriously the most ads in the game like a ridiculous amount and they get in the way good game to many ads
reviews.author: Corey Jeffers

reviews.title: Terrible
reviews.comment: Pathetic graphics, with equally as poor game play. The constant harassment of adverts is unbearable. You fear to tap anywhere incase an ad that will send you to a fraudulent website pops up. This game should not even be on the market.
reviews.author: Will Hewins

reviews.title: Just awful...
reviews.comment: This is one of the worst games I\'ve ever downloaded.  Terrible controls, game physics, design, etc. It\'s so bad it makes the other Angry Birds rip-offs look like 5 Star classics
reviews.author: Donnie Lewis II

reviews.title: Fun game..but Wizna is broken...
reviews.comment: No enemies or blocks appear. Cant continue cause theres nothing to destory.. Device: Transformer Prime TF201-  JELLYBEAN 4.2.2, and as previously posted. the ads are very annoying, almost makes it unplayable. Make a pro version without ads and cut down the ads in this game. I would buy it ; but a free version with less ads would be so much better....
reviews.author: chris frost

reviews.title: Suckas... too many adds and freezes all the time..
reviews.comment: Poor graphics. And poor effert of a game.. not even close to angry birds...more like angry at this game cuz of adds and freezing. Lol 0 stars if i had my way.
